General.Name: Ingevec
General.Description: Ingevec S.A., together with its subsidiaries, operates engineering and construction business in Chile. It is involved in the study, promotion, administration, and execution of real estate and urbanizations projects, which includes homes, buildings, civil, and other related works, as well as offers architecture and engineering services; and provision of professional and consultancy services. The company also invests in hotel and office projects located in Chile and Peru. Ingevec S.A. was founded in 1983 and is based in Santiago, Chile.
General.Address: Cerro El Plomo 5680, Santiago de Chile, Chile
